summary: This is a Certificate of Authenticity from Amazon, Inc. employee Maureen Townsel, certifying that Amazon produced authentic business records in response to a law enforcement request related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case (External Case No. 2018R01618). It confirms the documents are genuine records kept in the ordinary course of business.

persons.name: Maureen Townsel
persons.role: Law Enforcement Response Specialist at Amazon
persons.context: She is an employee of Amazon who declares under penalty of perjury that the documents produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request regarding Ghislaine Maxwell are authentic business records.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the external case (2018R01618) for which Amazon produced documents in response to a law enforcement subpoena.

connections.description: Townsel, as an Amazon employee, certified the authenticity of business records produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request concerning Maxwell.

events.title: Amazon Certificate of Authenticity Executed
events.description: Maureen Townsel of Amazon executed a Certificate of Authenticity under penalty of perjury, certifying that documents produced in response to a law enforcement request regarding Ghislaine Maxwell are authentic business records.

keyFacts: Amazon produced documents in response to a law enforcement request related to Ghislaine Maxwell (External Case No. 2018R01618).
Maureen Townsel, an Amazon Law Enforcement Response Specialist, certified under penalty of perjury that the produced documents are authentic business records.
The certification states the documents were kept in the ordinary course of business, created at or near the time of the events, and are part of regular business activity.
The document is dated January 31, 2020, and was executed in Seattle, Washington.
The document reference numbers include CRIM1048721, 2020 DS, and SDNYGM_00000972, indicating it is part of the Southern District of New York's case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
